1.0.name: wordpress/the-taxonomy-sort
1.0.description: Most commonly taxonomy sorting plugins will create a new interface to drag or order/sort your terms. This plugin uses the built-in view just to make things easier. Just grab the term and drag it to a new position. No more extra clicks - everything is saved after repositioning!
